author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: Cool design of an unfamiliar Mario enemy to me
review:
Opening;

Mario is an entity that I am personally not well versed in (but I have a soft spot for Mario kart on the Wii) and a fuzzy is the character I got in my mystery Mario pack series one as one of my 2020 Christmas gifts .

The character -

The character is built in a 2×2 rounded black plate and has snot bricks in the centre , the top and sides are an alternating pattern of tiles and 1×1 black pyramids on all three sides , the face is very goofy and is printed on a 2×2 black tile and the back is where Mario scans it with the factory applied sticker . 

The stand -

The stand is built on a 4×4 light green Mario introduced plate piece , there is a post using a clear part and a hinge to place fuzzy and some hill scenery using various rounded pieces including green and teele .

In conclusion -

this is a very nice set and as someone who could not care less who I got from my random pack , I am very satisfied as I just wanted a taste of this fresh new theme so I recommend it to any Lego fan because whoever you get there will be something to please you .
